channel.title: Bloons: Tower Defense 4
channel.description:
Anyone else play this game?
If so, what's your highest score?
Here's mine.
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/son22a.jpg[/img]
Could've gotten farther, but gave up at 89.
There was about 50-60 ceramic bloons coming, , 20-50 M.O.A.B.'s, and about 5-15 B.F.B's

item.title: Bloons: Tower Defense 4
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:6, topic:407927”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=509214.msg3694187#msg3694187 date=1312323286]
I usually play the 3rd one because its always on the front page of a site which is not blocked by my school (Woop)…

Usually get to around lvl 60 before lesson ends, so meh =[
[/quote]
I’m in collage and I still play this during my lectures. I love this game but it can get boring after a few days but then you crave it again and just have to play.[/quote]

I used to have a double lesson on tuesday and then a lesson on friday so it wasn’t too bad. There are lots of other games though.

Read full topic

item.title: Bloons: Tower Defense 4

item.description:
@Foxdie wrote:

Easy game… I’ve completed it many times and been in the top players.

item.title: Bloons: Tower Defense 4
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

m1lkman:

Thats why you make them special rocket launcher thingys with faces on. Got to level 10 then lag brought the game down.

Do what I do, rip the game off the webpage so you can play it directly from your desktop and dedicate about 90% of your C.P.U. to the game’s operations.

Read full topic

item.title: Bloons: Tower Defense 4
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

I have this app on my iphone. It was like $3, but it was well worth it

I’ve made it to like level 120+ on the first one but i’d have to do a different level with lag being so bad lol
